reviewComments: Just an all around whiz bang great ice cream outlet that has a TON of ice cream sandwiches and a great crew to boot.
It's It Ice Cream Factory.knownFor: “ Great treat ” Reviewed April 23, 2015 The ice cream factory offers tours but also sells the wonderful ice cream sandwiches they are known for and have been making since 1928. They consist of oatmeal cookies around generous amount of very tasty ice cream and covered with chocolate. They have 6 ice cream flavors including vanilla, chocolate, Strawberry, mint, Cappuccino, and Pumpkin. They also offer a more... More Helpful? 1 Thank EnjoyTraveling64 Report
